title: Main champion /Main Role
body: I have a question so atm im looking to Finaly find my main lane and champ so now i ask you for your opinion i Played all of These champs atleast 2 seasons so should i Main top or jungle and the second question is wich of These champs should i Main maokai shyvana or gangplank (Not because of the rework Played him Since season 3) so what do you think and please it is a serious question help me to Finaly find my lane and champ an Give me some advise and Tipps maybe you have another champ Who is fun to play for me wich could be my main soon... Thanks for the help i apriciat it :){{champion:102}} {{champion:57}}  {{champion:41}}

replies.body:
Okey i will do thank you for your advise i apriciat it :)
Hope we meet in game soon:))

At first: Don't let others tell you which champs or which role to play ;) Andyou don't have to focus only on ONE role, why not focus on top AND jungle? So at the moment Shyvana is really stron with Devourer and all, so why not practice her? Then Maokai and GP are great Toplaners, keep mastering them
And just try some fighters for those positions! What about Rengar Jungle? Or Maybe Irelia Top/Jungle?
